title: Police Investigate Homicide on Brightseat Road
body:
On March 31, 2012, at approximately 1:00 a.m., patrol
officers located Wiggins in the 1600 block of Brightseat Road suffering from a
gunshot wound.  Wiggins, of the 6300
block of Skillman Street, Capitol Heights, Maryland, was pronounced dead on the
scene.  Anyone with information about
this case is asked to call the Prince George’s County Police Department’s
Homicide Unit at 301-772-4925.  Callers wishing to remain anonymous may
call Crime Solvers at 1-866-411 TIPS (8477), text “PGPD plus your message” to
CRIMES (274637) on your cell phone or go to  and submit a
tip online.

Prince George's County Police
